uvi.description:
usbnet: sanity check for maxpacket

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.291 by commit b9eba0a4a527e04d712f0e0401e5391ef124b33e. For more details please see the references link.
